title: Input schema for the Flixbus Search Scraper

website.title: Website Domain
website.description: The top-level domain that determines the language used for input and output. Selecting the appropriate domain is crucial for accurate results. For example, if 'cz' is selected but the destination is 'Prague' (which is in English), it may not work as expected. In such cases, you can change the domain to 'com' or change 'Prague' to 'Praha' (the Czech name for Prague).

from.title: Departing City
from.description: The city from which the journey will begin.

to.title: Arrival City
to.description: The city to which the journey will be made.

rideDate.title: Date of Journey
rideDate.description: The date on which the trip will take place.

adult.title: Number of Adults
adult.description: Select the number of adults who will be traveling.

student.title: Number of Students
student.description: Select the number of students who will be traveling. Please note that students are required to show a valid student ID.

children_0_5.title: Number of Children (0-5 years old)
children_0_5.description: Select the number of children (0 to 5 years old) who will be traveling.

children_6_17.title: Number of Children (6-17 years old)
children_6_17.description: Select the number of children (6 to 17 years old) who will be traveling.

senior.title: Number of Seniors (65+ years old)
senior.description: Select the number of seniors (65 years old or older) who will be traveling.

bike_slot.title: Number of Bike Slots
bike_slot.description: Select the number of bike slots required. Please note that E-bikes and scooters are not allowed on buses.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Choose whether to use Apify Proxy or a custom proxy for the web scraping process.
